content: noro simple one-skein beanie a simple beanie made special by using noro or similar yarn skill level advanced beginner the pattern is written in a line by line format skills needed are knitting in the round the knit stitch knitting two stitches together supplies 50cm/20 4 5mm/us7 and 5mm/us8 circular needles 5mm/us8 dpn s 100m/-110yds noro kureyon or similar yarn stitch marker to mark the beginning/end of the round optional darning needle to sew in ends gauge 16 stitches x 24 row in stocking stitch on 5mm needles abbreviations k = knit p = purl k2tog = knit 2 stitches together pattern cast-on 80 stitches using 4 5mm needles join in the round taking care not to twist the stitches place marker optional k2 p2 ribbing for 8 row change to 5mm needles knit until 15cm from cast on edge crown shaping round 1 k6 k2tog repeat to end of round 70 stitches round 2 knit one round round 3 k5 k2tog repeat to end of round 60 stitches round 4 knit one round round 5 k4 k2tog repeat to end of round 50 stitches round 6 knit one round round 7 k3 k2tog repeat to end of round 40 stitches round 8 knit one round round 9 k2 k2tog repeat to end of round 30 stitches round 10 knit one round round 11 k1 k2tog repeat to end of round 20 stitches round 12 knit one round round 13 k2tog repeat to end of round 10 stitches break yarn and thread it through remaining stitches gently pull to close weave in ends the boring bit with respect please do not take credit for the pattern claim the pattern as your own or sell the pattern selling completed hats is fine but not the pattern or any part of the pattern if you sell the hats online please link back to me for pattern credit by using this pattern you are agreeing to my terms thank-you and happy knitting
